FROM hybdMember a WHERE 1 = 1
AND hymmDelNy = 1 AND hymmDelNy = 0
AND hymmDormancyNy = 1 AND hymmDormancyNy = 0
AND a.regDateTime BETWEEN #{shMemberDateStart} AND #{shMemberDateEnd} AND a.modDateTime BETWEEN #{shMemberDateStart} AND #{shMemberDateEnd} AND a.hymmDob BETWEEN #{shMemberDateStart} AND #{shMemberDateEnd}
AND hymmName LIKE concat('%',#{shHymmName},'%')
AND hymmName LIKE concat('%',#{shMemberValue},'%') AND hymmId LIKE concat('%',#{shMemberValue},'%') AND hymmNickname LIKE concat('%',#{shMemberValue},'%') AND hymmNumber LIKE concat('%',#{shMemberValue},'%')
mapper.select:
select * from hybdMember a where 1=1
AND hymmDelNy = 1 AND hymmDelNy = 0
AND hymmDormancyNy = 1 AND hymmDormancyNy = 0
AND hymmName LIKE concat('%',#{shHymmName},'%')
AND hymmName LIKE concat('%',#{shMemberValue},'%') AND hymmId LIKE concat('%',#{shMemberValue},'%') AND hymmNumber LIKE concat('%',#{shMemberValue},'%')
limit #{startRnumForMysql} , #{rowNumToShow}
select * from hybdMember where 1=1 and hymmDelNy = 0 and hymmSeq = #{hymmSeq}
select * from hybdMember where 1 = 1 and hymmDelNy = 0 and hymmSeq = #{hymmSeq}
SELECT a.hymmSeq ,a.hymmId FROM hybdMember a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.hymmId = #{hymmId}
SELECT a.hymmSeq ,a.hymmId ,a.hymmName ,a.hymmDesc ,a.hymmPwdModDate FROM hybdMember a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.hymmId = #{hymmId} AND a.hymmPassword = #{hymmPassword}
